title: Great Tales and Poems of Edgar Allan Poe
description: A collection of 21 tales and 34 poems. The tales included herein are:"The Tell-Tale Heart";"A Cask of Amontillado";"Hop-Frog";"The Black Cat";"Ligeia";"The Assignation";"The Oval Portrait";"The Masque of the Red Death";"The Fall of the House of Usher";"The Murders in the Rue Morgue";"The Mystery of Marie Roget";"The Purloined Letter";"The Gold Bug";"Shadow -- A Parable";"Ms. Found in a Bottle";"A Descent Into the Maelstrom";"The Pit and the Pendulum";"The Sphinx";"The Man of the Crowd";"The System of Dr. Tarr and Prof. Fether";and "William Wilson".
author: Edgar Allan Poe
